note: My name is Celia Condon and I am a student at the University of Missouri pursuing degrees in both journalism and business. I use journalism as an outlet for my creativity, and to use my passions each day. I am studying Strategic Communications within the journalism world and I love learning more about the topic everyday. I am able to communicate in an adult manner with the knowledge from my lessons in journalism.
